## Point.setFields() method

Add fields according to their type. All numeric type is considered float

**Signature:**

```typescript
setFields(fields: {
        [key: string]: number | boolean | string;
    }): Point;
```

|  fields | { \[key: string\]: number \| boolean \| string; } | name-value map |
